meanings.sent1: The implicit meaning of her smile was happiness.
meanings.sent2: His implicit agreement was shown through a nod.
meanings.sent3: The implicit invitation to the party was hidden in her tone.
meanings.sent4: The implicit warning in his eyes made her pause.
meanings.sent5: The implicit trust between them was unspoken but strong.

meanings.definition: Contained in the nature of something though not readily apparent.
meanings.sent1: The implicit danger of the situation became clear later.
meanings.sent2: The implicit beauty of the painting was revealed under the light.
meanings.sent3: The implicit surprise in the gift made her gasp with joy.
meanings.sent4: The implicit complexity of the problem required careful analysis.
meanings.sent5: The implicit connection between them was felt instantly.

meanings.definition: Capable of being understood from something else though unexpressed.
meanings.sent1: The implicit message in his words was clear to her.
meanings.sent2: Her implicit trust in him was evident in her actions.
meanings.sent3: The implicit agreement between them was sealed with a handshake.
meanings.sent4: The implicit understanding between friends needs no words.
meanings.sent5: The implicit bond between siblings was unbreakable.
